greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of Sophie Germain primes.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = if n and also 2*n+1 is prime then 1 else 0.
For n>1 a(n) = floor((floor(phi(n)/(n-1)) + floor(phi(2*n+1)/(2*n)))/2). - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Apr 28 2012
For n>1 a(n) = floor(phi(2*n^2+n)/(2*n^2-2*n)). - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, May 02 2012
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 13 2009
